title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description:
Bug 9654: Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page.
The first and second column could be merged.
OB:
The marking between the button and the list is too large.
The top button should be aligned with the dialog top.
The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic.
Multiple selection should be allowed, as 'move up' / 'move down' can be applied to more than one item.
The signature preview must be a label that wraps.
EB:
The marking between the button and the list should be of appropriate size.
The top button should be aligned with the dialog top.
The table should have a label to contain a mnemonic.
Multiple selection should be allowed for 'move up' / 'move down' operations.
The signature preview should have the background color set to the same color as a hover.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Change a parameter name to something very long.
2. Observe that the preview is cur off.
